<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t bother moving everything down, just null out the slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">      Worklist&#91;It-&gt;second&#93; = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
